flawed_nl_solution:
Billy took some candies and got more from his father for a total of 6+8 = <<6+8=14>>14 candies
Caleb has a total of 11+11 = <<11+11=22>>22 candies
Their father gave out 8+11 = <<8+11=16>>16 candies from a pack of 36
He gave the rest which is 36-16 = <<36-16=20>>20 candies to Andy
Andy has a total of 9+20 = <<9+20=29>>29 candies
Andy has 29-22 = <<29-22=7>>7 more candies than Caleb

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
